show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
Amazing British psychiatrist Philip Thomas takes us on a tour of exciting new reform events in Great Britain including... <!--more--> the Critical Psychiatry Network which he helped to found.   Also learn about yesterday’s $1.
5 million malpractice verdict where I testified on behalf of a child damaged by psychiatric drugs.
